title: Mitsubishi Bets Big on U.S. Gas With $5.2 Billion Haynesville Deal

title: Bipartisan Bill Proposes $2.5 Billion U.S. Critical Minerals Reserve
summary: A bipartisan group of lawmakers introduced a bill on Thursday, proposing the creation of a $2.5 billion critical minerals reserve in the United States. title: China Leads Global Coal Power Additions Despite Renewables Push
